results.name: The second left hand column of triangle A167591.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-24,32,-16).
xref: Equals the second left hand column of triangle A167591.
Other left hand columns are A001787, A167593, A168307 and A168308.
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Nov 10 2009
